sentences.sContent: There was a mass picket (= one involving a lot of people ) by students outside the main office of the university.
sentences.sCn: 那所大学的主办公楼外有一支庞大的学生纠察队。

synos.tran: [军]警戒哨；[劳经]纠察队；[建]尖木桩

trans.tranCn: 警戒哨；纠察队；[建] 尖木桩
trans.tranOther: when a group of people stand or march in front of a shop, factory, government building etc to protest about something or to stop people from going in during a  strike

trans.tranCn: 派……担任纠察；用尖桩围住
